title: Jeff, Job, Luke, Salvation is a successive elimination of what we have to what we are
description:
This is our first four way conversation, a meetup online of sorts. The conversation ranges of course. Job in his quest to find God, Luke in his escape from evangelicalism to orthodoxy, Jeff in his continuous exploration of CS Lewis. 

Hallmark of a good community
Why do we watch? 
Salience
Gabriel Marcel, Searching. People who are honest seekers
Committed to the truth outside of the truth they currently apprehend
There’s a whole new existence in which life is worth living
Maybe there will be another video and I’ll understand a bit better
Admiration
My conversation with Rod
The journey towards salvation is marked by a successive elimination of all that we have in order to reach what we are. 
Nathan Jacobs and Hank Hannegraff

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333
